"Mobile Fortress Destruction":
"There's a report of a Mech running
rampant in the Quarry area of Planet
Lillipa. Surveys in the area say that the
Mech in question is flight capable with
similar characteristics of that of
Big Vardha. We ask that all ARKS are
to enter the area to engage and defeat
this rampaging machine.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
